content.query:
CREATE VIEW ProdCostHist AS
select 
    ProductID = JSON_VALUE(Body, '$.ProductID'),
    StartDate = JSON_VALUE(Body, '$.StartDate'),
    EndDate = JSON_VALUE(Body, '$.EndDate'),
    StandardCost = JSON_VALUE(Body, '$.StandardCost'),   
    ModifiedDate = JSON_VALUE(Body, '$.ModifiedDate')
from openrowset(
    bulk 'https://demostreamdatalake.dfs.core.windows.net/datalake/Raw/ProdCostHist/Year=*/Month=*/Day=*/File=*/*.snappy.parquet',
    format = 'parquet')
 AS [r];
